232b7('bum): snang ba'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams ri dpung
232b8('bum): gnyen re// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nams ni skyabaso// gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams ni mgon no// gzugs med pa'i snyems par
233a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni ma'o// gzugs med pa'i stongs par 'jug pa rnams ni pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
233a2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ster par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni lam mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad na snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sgren ma'o// blo'o
233a3('bum): shes pa'o// shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni skyabs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni mgon re// rnam par thar pa ba
233a4('bum): dpa'// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni pa'o// mthar gyi sa gangs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snar par rig
233a5('bum): par bya ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ni lam me// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ni sdang ba'o// mthar
233a6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sgren ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab be// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ni dpung gnyer ni// mthar
233a7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa dgu ni skyabs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ni mgon no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
233a8('bum): dgu ni ma'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu ni pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ byang chub
233b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i ske steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa ni lab mo// rnam par thar
233b2('bum): pa'i ske steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni snang ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa ni sgren ma'o// 
233b3('bum): blo'o// shes pa'i/ shes rab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa ni dpung gnyen no// rnam par pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / 
233b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa ni skyab so// rnam bar thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid pa dang / mtshan ma med ba dang / smin pa med pa ni mgon no// rnam par tha
233b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sA na pa med pa ni ma'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa
233b6('bum): ni pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam me// mngon par
233b7('bum): shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mngon par shes pa rnams ni dpung gnyen no// mngon par shes pa
233b8('bum): rnams ni skyabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mgon no// mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni pha'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ byang chub
234a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig pa bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ri lam mo// tinge 'dzin rnams ri sdang ba'o// ting 'dzin
234a2('bum): rnams na sbrer ba'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab be// ting nge 'dzin rnams ri dpung gnyen no// tinge 'dzin rnams ni skabaso// ting 'dzir rnams ni mgon re// ting nge 'dzin na
234a3('bum): ri ma'o// ti nge 'dzin rnams ni pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sten par rig par bya ste/ gzungs kyi sde rnams ni lam mo// 
234a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snang ba'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sgron ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab be/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dpung gnyen no// gzungs kyi sku
234a5('bum): mas ri skangs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mgon no/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa ni pha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu na
234a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sten par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni lam me// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni snang ba'i
234a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sgren ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dpung gnyen no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
234a8('bum): stobs bcu ni skyabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu ni mgon no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcu ni pa'o// mi 'jigs pa
234b1('bum): bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sten par rig par bya ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sdang ba'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhir sgren ma'o
234b2('bum): blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni skyabs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mgon no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni ma'o// 
234b3('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi ni pha'o// so so yang dag pa rig pa bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi na
234b4('bum): lam mo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni snang ba'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sgron ma'o// zlo'o// she sa pa'o// shes rab po// so so yang dag par rig pa
234b5('bum): bzhi ni dpung gnyen no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni skyab so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nim gon no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma'o// 
234b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni pha'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/ sangs
234b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni lam mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni snang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sgron ma'o/ rje'o// 
234b8('bum): shes pa'o// shes rab bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dpung gnyen no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni skyabs// sangs rgyas kyi chos
235a1('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mgon no// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni pha'o// lam
235a2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sten par rig par bya ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam me// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
235a3('bum): nyid ni snang ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgren ma'o// blo'o// shes pa'o// shes rab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen no// lam gyi rnam pa
235a4('bum): shes pa nyid ni skyab so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid na ma'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pa'o// rnam pa
235a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
235a6('bum): chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
235a7('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
235a8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yu gyur to// rab 'byer byang chub kyi
235b1('bum): phyogs kyi ches sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tshe skyeng
235b2('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yang yab dang yum du gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di las byung ba ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
235b3('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ rab 'byor de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
235b4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgya sa kyi zhing yengasu dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yong su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ bsdu ba'i
235b5('bum): dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongasu bsdu bar bya 'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / den spyad pa dang / don mthun pa ste/ rab 'byor
235b6('bum): ngas den kyi dbang de mthong bas/ 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235b7('bum): rnams kyi sten pa dang / pa dang / ma dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyabs dang / mgon yin no zhes brjod do// rab 'byor de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235b8('bum): pe gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi the tso gcad par 'dod pa dang / 
236a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yengasu dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
236a2('bum): bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos/ gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to
236a3('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
236a4('bum): na mkha' ltar chags pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
236a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i
236a6('bum): mtshan nyid des/ chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// 
236a7('bum): de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
236a8('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o// chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o// rab 'byor
236b1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des/ 
236b2('bum): chos thams cad yod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/ chos thams cad kyang / 
236b3('bum): chos thams cad kyis steng na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni
236b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par/ byang bar mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/ 
236b5('bum): dben pa dang / stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang mi rgya/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang
236b6('bum): yang mi dmigs/ dben pas ni stong pa nyid la/ sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i
236b7('bum): don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang
236b8('bum): bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/ gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de de lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang // bdag gi
237a1('bum): bgyi bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing / kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na// sem
237a2('bum): can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/ gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med/ gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la
237a3('bum): sems can kun tu rgyug cing / kun tu 'khor ba med cing / kun tu 'khor ba med de/ de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ 
237a4('bum): sems can rnams kyi rnam par byed pa yod ba yin no// gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyad pa
237a5('bum): gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba la mi spyod/ 'du shes la mi spyod/ 'du byed la mi sbed/ rnam bar shes pa la mi spyod do// mig la mi spyad/ 
237a6('bum): ba la mi spyod/ sA la mi spyod/ lce la mi spyod/ lus la mi spyod/ yid la mi spyod do// gzugs la mi spyod/ sgra la mi spyod/ dri la mi spyod/ rol mi spyod/ reg la
237a7('bum): spong/ chos lo ma spyod de// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi sbed/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la
237a8('bum): spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa pa'i spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i spyod/ sna'i 'dus te/ 
237b1('bum): reg pa la spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yi spyod/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lami spyod do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
237b2('bum): mi spyod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la mi spyod/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la mi spyod/ 
237b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la mi spyod/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod do// sa'i khams la mi spyod/ chu'i khams la mi spyod/ me
237b4('bum): khams la mi spyod/ rlung gi khams la mi spyod// nam kha'i khams la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i kham sa la mi spyod/ ma rig pa la mi spyod/ 'du byed la mi
237b5('bum): spyod/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ ming dang ga zugs la mi spyod/ skye mched drug la mi spyod/ re ga pa la mi spyod/ tsher ba la mi spyod/ sred pa la mi
237b6('bum): sprid len pa la mi spyod/ srid pa la mi spyod/ skye ba la mi spyod/ rga shi la mi sbed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
237b7('bum): mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237b8('bum): byin pa la mi spyod do// nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ chen po stong pa
238a1('bum): la mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ 'dus byas steng pa nyid la mi skyed/ 'dus pa byas steng pa nying la mi sbed/ mtha' las 'das pa
238a2('bum): stong pa nyid la mi sbed/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid la mi sbed/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ ches thams cad steng pa nyid
238a3('bum): la mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid la mi spyod/ dngos po med pa steng pa nyid la mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid la
238a4('bum): sbed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi skyed/ de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod/ ya nga dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
238a5('bum): pa rnams la mi skyed/ dbang po rnams la mi spyod/ stobs rnams la mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi sbed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
238a6('bum): brgyad pa la mi spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams la mi sbed/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug
238a7('bum): pa rnams la mi sbed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbul mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
238a8('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod/ ting 'dzin rnams la mi skyed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
238b1('bum): stobs bcu la mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mi skyed/ byabs pa chen po la mi spyod/ snying rje chen po la mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
238b2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi sbed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/ dgra ba
238b3('bum): pa nyid la mi spyod/ rang byang chub la mi spyad/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi sbed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di lta
238b4('bum): gang skyed pa dang / gang gis spyod pa dang / gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigaso// brtse ma ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa
238b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yi na du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste/ bco ma ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa
238b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi nuso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
238b7('bum): dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis gnon pa la gnas pas// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la
238b8('bum): bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi gnon pa ste// bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
239a1('bum): gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga pa
239a2('bum): med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa ngal/ 
239a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis// rim gror byas/ bkur bstir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mched pa byas ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla ra med pa yang dag par
239a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu me de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
239a5('bum): gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar ga shegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am
239a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par
239a7('bum): 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nas ches
239a8('bum): mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med
239b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
239b2('bum): la zhig gis/ rim grer byas/ bkur bsti byas/ pu dung byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
239b3('bum): na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nas de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
239b4('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
239b5('bum): pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'gre la pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar
239b6('bum): byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ra
239b7('bum): 'byer gal te steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus theb par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
239b8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror
240a1('bum): byas// bkur bsti byas/ bdung du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengs su
240a2('bum): bsngos na/ rab 'byer de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
240a3('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnan
240a4('bum): la sten pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam pa ra 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag
240a5('bum): par sten pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byer
240a6('bum): gal te steng gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par ma'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
240a7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
240a8('bum): la zhig gis/ rim gror byas/ bkur bsti byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu
240b1('bum): bsngos na// rab 'byer 'ji sam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma de'i bsod rnams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel las/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngang // bden
240b2('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la sten
240b3('bum): pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / 
240b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/ de'i bsed nas ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te/ steng gsum gyi stong

240b6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis/ rim grer bas
240b7('bum): bkur bsti bas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsdes na/ rab 'ber de ji snyam

241a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

241a4('bum): gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med bar ma'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i
241a5('bum): las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gta na bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems
241a6('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig
241a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu
241a8('bum): bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bged de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos na
241b1('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // ba
241b2('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

241b4('bum): ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par
241b5('bum): mi'i lus theb par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan
241b6('bum): bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bged pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab
241b7('bum): tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras rdub tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang
241b8('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
242a1('bum): blar ba pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos dang / rab 'byer de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu re re'i bas ra
242a2('bum): de'i rgyas yang du 'phel lapa/ gsel ba/ bcopa lngan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de bas kyang
242a3('bum): rags kya 'ang/ rigs kyi bu me gang la las gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa 'di gzhan la spen pa dang / 'chang ba dang / rnam par gzhag pa dang / rab tu gsheg pa dang
242a4('bum): 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar bang pa dang / yang dag par sten na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel le// rab 'byor gal te/ steng gi 'jig
242a5('bum): dag khabs kyi sems can gang ji skad pa de dag thams cang snga phyi med par maM'i lus theb par gyur la/ gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu pa la la zhig gis/ dge
242a6('bum): ba bcu' las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
242a7('bum): bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu
242a8('bum): bged pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bged pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag pa
242b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
242b2('bum): 'u 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi
242b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de bas kyang / rigs bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang / rnam par gzhog
242b4('bum): pa dang / rab tu gzheg pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par sten na/ de'i bsed nams ches mang du 'phel lo// 
242b5('bum): rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khabs kyi sems can snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me la
242b6('bum): la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab bkod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / gzugs med pa
242b7('bum): snyems par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

243a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos ra/ 
243a2('bum): 'byer de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang

243a6('bum): mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rab

243b1('bum): pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag

243b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
243b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni/ sems
243b8('bum): can gang la'ang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs te/ de dag shes
244a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gsad par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/ de dag snying rje chen po 'theb bo// de dag
244a2('bum): rnam par spyod pa des/ rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang / mngon par dga' bar gyur te/ de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par grub bo// de dag par ra pa de dang
244a3('bum): ldan gcig tu gnas te/ de dag btang snyems cher po 'thob bo// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi snang ba dar pa ste
244a4('bum): 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// brtser 'grus kyi pha rol
244a5('bum): tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi na pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag ni rnam pa thams
244a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
244a7('bum): phyir mi ldeg go/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// rnam par spyod pa'i phyir su'i ges dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi
244a8('bum): rkyen rtsi dang / ye byad la yongasu spyod pa'i gtong ba dang / sbyin bdag ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'bar do ba
244b1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po den med par khams kyi bsed sems la spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can tham cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang / snang ba chen po 'byung
244b2('bum): bar 'dod pa dang / khams gsum gyi brtson ran gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongasu dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig bskyed par 'dod
244b3('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
244b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par mi spyod na'ang / des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi ge skabs mid bye ste/ des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
244b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gteng gi nga brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sngan chad ner bu rin po che rnyed ma myong
244b6('bum): ba'i skyes bu zhig yed pa des/ dus gzhan zhig na ner bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/ des ner bu rin po che de rnyed pas/ dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan par
244b7('bum): gyur pa las/ des ner bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/ de'i rgyus sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kye sa dang dag
244b8('bum): ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che dang bral bar gyur te zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun tu 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
245a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'i snyam du bsams te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o// 
245a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de stor bar yang mi bya ste/ de ltar na rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsel ba/ bcom lngar
245a3('bum): 'das yid la bgyid pa de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ yid la bgyid pa thams cad kyang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa/ 
245a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/ bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/ yid la
245a5('bum): bgyi ba mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te/ byang chub
245a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ sangs rgyas
245a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyen med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma ner ba de
245a8('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na/ byang chub sems dpa
245b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis
245b2('bum): dben/ rang bzhin gyis steng pa ste/ de la 'phel ba med de// yengasu 'grib pa med do// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang
245b3('bum): bzhin gyis dben zhing / rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
245b4('bum): la dag par 'byung zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
245b5('bum): rab 'byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'byung yang 'phel ba 'am/ yongasu 'grib pa med de/ de
245b6('bum): nyid la 'phel ba 'am/ yengasu 'grib pa med de// chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am/ yongasu 'grib pa med do// yang dag pa'i ga la 'phel ba 'am/ yongasu 'grib pa
245b7('bum): med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/ gnyis kyang ma yin re// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems
245b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ mi 'gong / mi 'jigs/ mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i rang
246a1('bum): la gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// 
246a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag brgya pa// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
246a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i steng pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
246a4('bum): spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de ni ma yin no// gsel ba/ bcom lda/ 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na gang shes
246a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sped pa'i chos gang yang dmig sa su mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de ri ma yin no// gsel ba/ 
246a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin re// gsel ba/ 
246a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ steng pa nyid steng pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
246a8('bum): steng pa nyid las gud du steng pa nyid spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs shes
246b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tsher ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// 'du shes shes rab
246b2('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes shes rab kyi pha
246b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// mig shes rab kyi pha
246b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dang/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbeng ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
246b5('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus shes rab kyi pha rol tu
246b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yir ro// rab
246b7('bum): 'bor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sgra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
246b8('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
247a1('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ reg shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
247a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
247a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa she
247a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 
247a5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
247a6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa shes rab
247a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i 'dus
247a8('bum): te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
247b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom
247b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba
247b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
247b4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
247b5('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
247b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das
247b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// sa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
247b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chu'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ me'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
248a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rlung gi khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ namakha'i khams
248a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
248a3('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de ni pa yin re// rab 'byor gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma rig pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'ang ci lags
248a4('bum): 'du byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ bcom ldan 'das
248a5('bum): ci lags/ ming dang gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag sa/ skye mched drug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
248a6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ reg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dang/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tsher ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
248a7('bum): dpa/ bcom lngaran 'das ci lags/ sred pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ len pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
248a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ srid pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
248b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rga shi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis
248b2('bum): gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha
248b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
248b4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ bser 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
248b5('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam
248b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ nang steng pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
248b7('bum): pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byi steng pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha ril
248b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chen po steng pa nyid
249a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed ngam/ bcom
249a2('bum): lngar 'das ci lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbeng ngam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
249a3('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ theg ma dang tha ma med
249a4('bum): pa steng pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dor ba med pa steng ba nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
249a5('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid she
249a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mi dmigs
249a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
249a8('bum): lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dang/ 
249b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
249b2('bum): ba la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes rab
249b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dbang po lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stobs lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub kyi yang lag bdun shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod das/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
249b5('bum): lag brgyad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i bde na pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dang/ 
249b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags// bsam gtan bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshad med pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
249b7('bum): la spyod dang/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
249b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu par pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ca lags
250a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mjed par shes
250a2('bum): ba rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ting 'dzin rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzungs kyi sgrenam
250a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mi
250a4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
250a5('bum): 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha ral
250a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dras
250a7('bum): bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa
250a8('bum): tshad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
250b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// rnam pa dzad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
250b2('bum): 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gseg cing dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po sa
250b3('bum): mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang // chos skyon med
250b4('bum): pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshor ba'i steng pa
250b5('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma ner ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
250b6('bum): bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha
250b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin

256b1('bum): nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ches nying
256b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bco
256b3('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de
256b4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / cho sa skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
256b5('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor de ni yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
256b6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhi
256b7('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ches nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khya
256b8('bum): pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / 
257a1('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin cing dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
257a2('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 
257a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma ner ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
257a4('bum): pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de/ 
257a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom lnga na 'das ci lags/ ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid
257a6('bum): dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang
