262a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng phrag brgya pa/ bab pa sa brgya'i gsum pa// rab
262a7('bum): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid
262a8('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
262b1('bum): ba'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gso
262b2('bum): nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas
262b3('bum): nyid dang / chos skyen med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rdzu 'phrul
262b4('bum): rkang pa bzhi'i steng pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa
262b5('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / tshe/ sa kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
262b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das tsa lags/ dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa
262b7('bum): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dang
262b8('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsong
263a1('bum): cing dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
263a2('bum): ches kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/ 
263a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 
263a4('bum): ma ner ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
263a5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lag/ sa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid
263a6('bum): dang / gseg nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
263a7('bum): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263a8('bum): la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
263b1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
263b2('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bsam gtan bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang
263b3('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yi/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings
263b4('bum): chos gnas nyid dang / chos skyon sa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci
263b5('bum): lags/ tshad med pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsoganyi da dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor bde
263b6('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
263b7('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / 
263b8('bum): gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
264a1('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
264a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / 
264a3('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos
264a4('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ 
264a5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ste nga ba nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin
264a6('bum): nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
264a7('bum): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
264a8('bum): smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa
264b1('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyis dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi
264b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa
264b3('bum): nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
264b4('bum): pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ting 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
264b5('bum): dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po mam ches pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
264b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
264b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba
264b8('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
265a1('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid dang / 
265a2('bum): gseg nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / ches
265a3('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom
265a4('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma ner bde
265a5('bum): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / cho sa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / ches kyi gnas te/ da dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
265a6('bum): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ so se yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid
265a7('bum): gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ches nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
265a8('bum): dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
265b1('bum): 'das ci lags/ byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
265b2('bum): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
265b3('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ snying rje chen po'i steng pa nyid dang / gseg nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang
265b4('bum): snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / ches kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ches
265b5('bum): skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi ches
265b6('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
265b7('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / ches nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
265b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i steng pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang
266a1('bum): ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / ches kyi gnas nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
266a2('bum): pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid
266a3('bum): dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / ches skyon med pa
266a4('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan ci lcags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid dang / 
266a5('bum): gsog nyid dang / gseb nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid
266a6('bum): dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ 
266a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / 
266a8('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes
266b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rang byang chub kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
266b2('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
266b3('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyi
266b4('bum): dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma ma ches pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / 
266b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
266b6('bum): spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / rag lus pa nyid dang / snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang / 
266b7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
266b8('bum): mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
267a1('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes
267a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis
267a3('bum): mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267a4('bum): chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyo dkyis mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
267a5('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de/ dmigasu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
267a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su med de/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das
267a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
267a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ rab 'byor 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
267b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/ lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa der rtsol te/ de ltar 'bad pa
267b2('bum): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
267b3('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/ de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
267b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongasu 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags// chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags/ byang chub se
267b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de na
267b6('bum): ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ skye ba yang ma lags/ mi skye ba yang ma lags pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
267b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ skye ba yang ma lags/ mi skye ba yang
267b8('bum): ma lags pa las kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
268a1('bum): ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa
268a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyed kyis yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
268a3('bum): chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni/ bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo nge// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon
268a4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i ches kyang bdag gis yang dag
268a5('bum): par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'astsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ches thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
268a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya
268a7('bum): bar mi semaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i
268a8('bum): phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u ba ni bcu drug go// / de
268b1('bum): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel te// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slang du zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
268b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du blta dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
268b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o// 
268b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du ni ba phra ba zhib pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du
268b5('bum): mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom lnga na 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / 
268b6('bum): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i
268b7('bum): chos gnon gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang
268b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di/ nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par
269a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa baH/ 
269a2('bum): ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur// bsam gtan ban
269a3('bum): dang ldan par gyur/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu
269a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di 'dzin cing / 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/ bzung zhing bcas te/ blags
269a5('bum): shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du nan tan byed na/ ko'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong
269a6('bum): gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gre'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar
269a7('bum): mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi
269a8('bum): bzod do// de nas dge slong gcig gcig gis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan
269b1('bum): bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
269b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan
269b3('bum): du byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa de dag gyis zil gyis non
269b4('bum): te/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras// dge slong 'dzam bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan
269b5('bum): bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems
269b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
269b7('bum): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang
269b8('bum): dgos te/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
270a1('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang / maM dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnanan cing 'gro ba
270a2('bum): yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag zang
270a3('bum): kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su yang ma zad/ byang chub sems dpa'
270a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
270a5('bum): bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing / 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang
270a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag zil gyis
270a7('bum): gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / 
270a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// bzod pa'i
270b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
270b2('bum): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma
270b3('bum): zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes
270b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gre bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa'
270b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya na pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil
270b6('bum): gyis gnan par mi nu so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bstan pa dang 'thun
270b7('bum): par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
270b8('bum): dpa' chen po de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du mi byed pa'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ snying po byang chub dang pang bar mi 'gyuraro// byang
271a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sems can bying pa rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
271a2('bum): bo de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la sleb pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa
271a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te/ nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o// kye skyes bu chen po myur du spobs shig/ skyes bu chen po skyen par
271a4('bum): slebs shig/ lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ blang
271a5('bum): bar bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa da gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa bzhepa'i zer zhing ston to// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
271a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'deng bar sem so// drung du
271a7('bum): bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems// lha'i dbang po rab mtshe ma yang mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar semaso// lha'i rgyal po rab
271a8('bum): dga' ldan yang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar semaso// lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sem so// lha'i
271b1('bum): rgyal po dbang sgyur yang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar semaso// tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po yang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar
271b2('bum): semaso// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// mi che ba
271b3('bum): lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'deng bar semaso// gya nem snang ba'i lha rnams kyang
271b4('bum): bar 'dong bar semaso// gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar semaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de
271b5('bum): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de
271b6('bum): lus la ni/ 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang / thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ dge slong de ni
271b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ni yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/ 'dus pa'i nang rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ 
271b8('bum): mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam/ lus kyi nad dam/ snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/ de dag kyang byang chub sems
272a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ 
272a2('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sten cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus
272a3('bum): sten snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa/ sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad
272a4('bum): ces smras// btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sten pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa rjed pa ni/ sangs rgya
272a5('bum): kyi mthur rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal to// dga' ma de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
272a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di sten pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa rjed pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs
272a7('bum): pa'i byin gyi rlab so// dga' bo gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
272a8('bum): par byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'i tshe/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yed pa de thams cad/ 
272b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu bya ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
272b2('bum): bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam
272b3('bum): ste/ dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud
272b4('bum): sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngu zug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig ce
272b5('bum): can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa lags/ sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang / 
272b6('bum): zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ldang bar gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
272b7('bum): to/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'chi bar 'gyur ram// bcom ldan
272b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no// dga' bos
273a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ji lta bu'i drung du 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis/ sden
273a2('bum): gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig te can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems
273a3('bum): dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam// 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig te can ga
273a4('bum): ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
273a5('bum): pa zab me 'di ma thos so// ma thos pas mi shes so// she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas// de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed de/ dga' bo byang chub sems
273a6('bum): dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yeng
273a7('bum): su 'dzin pa byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la 'ang / bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub
273a8('bum): sems dpAs pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni/ bdag gi grogs yin te/ gang
273b1('bum): dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/ bdag gis gregasu rnyed pa ste/ de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di
273b2('bum): ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/ de bdag gi bsam pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang
273b3('bum): bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha re
273b4('bum): tu phyin pa zab me 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di shin tu zab ste/ khyed kyis shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/ bsgoms
273b5('bum): pa dang / bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na/ khyed kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa
273b6('bum): de la yang bdud sdig te can gyis glags snyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa skyed
273b7('bum): cing / nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'o// nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
273b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// khyed ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyed na
274a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyed ni bzong bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyed ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa rgya ma
274a2('bum): khyed ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyed ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// zhes rlom sems su byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la
274a3('bum): yang bdud sdig te can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na/ dga' bo de'i tshe/ bdud sdig te
274a4('bum): can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dag 'a ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig te can gyis
274a5('bum): glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa 'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de ming brjed pa 'am/ rus brjed
274a6('bum): pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing / bdag stong gzhan sbed la/ phyir mi ldeg pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274a7('bum): chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang / de la med par rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa de dag gis nyen mongs pa skyed cing / bdag steng/ gzhan smod de
274a8('bum): 'di skad du/ ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar/ khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo // byang
274b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes/ de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems
274b2('bum): te/ bdag gi gnas ni stong par mi 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
274b3('bum): zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlobs te/ de'i tshig gzung du rung bas/ skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa
274b4('bum): dang / yid ches par bya bar sems te/ de la de dag gis thos sam/ mthong ba 'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/ bdag gis tho sa sam/ mthong nas/ 'thun par spyod cing / de bzhin
274b5('bum): sleb ste/ de dag de bzhin du slob pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid du/ slob cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de lta de dag
274b6('bum): bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyis las gang dang gang brtsams pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub
274b7('bum): par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu
274b8('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid ba
275a1('bum): ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsed cing / nga ni mchog
275a2('bum): tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thab
275a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ 
275a4('bum): de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi ste gnas kyi lam mo// de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi la ma mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin
275a5('bum): no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang ga nga zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa can gzhan du 'thab cing
275a6('bum): rtsod la/ 'khrug cing 'tshang 'drun/ de la bdud sdig te can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med
275a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
275a8('bum): pa nyid kyi lam ma yin no rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byong song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsamaso zhes nas/ dga' zhing spro/ 
275b1('bum): ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde bskye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa la gnod par sems shing
275b2('bum): 'thab cing rtsod la/ 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru na/ gal te nges rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa
275b3('bum): dang / 'khrug cing 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan ma
275b4('bum): mchis sam/ 'on te ma lags kyis/ bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / 8
275b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dang 'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa
275b6('bum): theg pa pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsed la/ gshe zhing mi snyan tu brjod pa dang / 'thabs rtsod de/ gshe ba dang / mi snyan pa brjod pa byas nas/ phyir
275b7('bum): mi chags par mdud par 'dzin cing / khon tu bzung ste gnas na/ dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar 'ang mi smra ste/ gang zag des gal te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su
275b8('bum): mi gtang zhe na/ gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snye go cha bgo bar bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang 'thabs shing rtsed de/ gshe zhing mi snyan par
276a1('bum): brjod par gyur na yang / mdud par mi 'dzin la/ byin cang sdom par 'dzin cing / bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad
276a2('bum): kyi sdug bsngal brtsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dges na/ de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing
276a3('bum): phyir zlogs pa ni/ mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o// bdag gis glen pa dang / lkug pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni/ 
276a4('bum): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongasu mya ngan la bzla bar bya dgos na/ de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems
276a5('bum): byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa'i chu ga na/ dag gdos tsug gags de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
276a6('bum): de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/ de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing / glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276a7('bum): chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o// de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gang te 'dug na yang de su la yang
276a8('bum): gnod sems su mi bya/ 'khrug par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod semasu bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo// de ci'i phyir
276b1('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las dgrol bar bya bdag
276b2('bum): go snyam du bya'o// dga' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par
276b3('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag
276b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs te/ gru gtso ga tu zhugs pa'o// 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de
276b5('bum): bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'dis ni sgra na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
276b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi
276b7('bum): nang steng pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid steng pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
276b8('bum): las 'das pa steng pa nyid dang / theg ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid dang / der ba med pa steng pa nyid dang / rang bzhin steng pa nyid dang / chos thams cad steng pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid sdeng
277a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo 'ang steng pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar
277a2('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
277a3('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
277a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 
277a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgoHmas cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
277a6('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa
277a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems pa bskyed do// des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 
277a8('bum): 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston pa ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral 'gyur na/ 
277b1('bum): de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na/ bdag ga
277b2('bum): kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ de ltar sdeb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
277b3('bum): phyin pa steng phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu bdud de// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer gyis bcom ldan
277b4('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsel te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277b5('bum): chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags// bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer nang steng pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b6('bum): rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// rab 'byor gyi stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi dang stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub
277b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor steng pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// 
277b8('bum): rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// rab 'byor der dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sam
278a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'a
278a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
278a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byer
278a4('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// rab 'byor rang ba zhin stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278a5('bum): chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos tha mas cad stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'a
278a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
278a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid steng
278a8('bum): pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo tsan stong pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
278b1('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba ni// tshor bas stong / 'du shes ni/ 'du shes kyis stong / 'du byed ni/ 'du byed kyis stong / rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes
278b2('bum): pas stong / mig ni/ mig gis stong / rna ba ni/ rna bas stong / sna ni/ snas stong / lce ni lces stong / lus ni luH stong / yid ni/ yid kyis steng // gzugs ni/ gzugs kyis steng / sgra ni/ smras
278b3('bum): steng / dri ni/ dris stong / re ni/ res steng / reg ni/ reg gis stong / chos ni/ chos kyis stong // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pas steng / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rna
278b4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pas steng / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pas stong / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pas stong / lus kyi rnam par
278b5('bum): shes pa ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas
278b6('bum): steng / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong / 
278b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pas steng / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas steng // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni/ mig gi
278b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rabs steng / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher bas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
279a1('bum): tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rab ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas steng / lus kyi 'dus
279a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bas steng / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bas steng / 
279a3('bum): sa'i khams ni/ sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni/ chu'i khams kyis stong / me'i khams ni/ me'i khams kyis stong / rlung gi khas ni/ rlung gi khams kyis stong / na mkha'i
279a4('bum): khams ni/ namakha'i khams kyis steng / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong // ma rig pa ni/ ma rig pas steng / 'du byed ni/ 'du byed kyis steng
279a5('bum): rnam par shes pa ni/ rnam par shes pas steng / ming dang gzugs ni/ ming dang gzugs kyis stong / skye mche da drug ni/ skye mched drug gis steng / reg pa ni/ reg pas
279a6('bum): stong / tsher ba ni/ tshe rabs steng / sred pa ni sred pas stong / len pa ni/ len pas steng / srid pa ni/ srid pas steng / skye ba ni/ skye bas stong / rga shi naM/ rga shes stang // sbyin pa'i rol tu
279a7('bum): phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas steng / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin
279a8('bum): pas stong / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas steng / shes
279b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong // nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi stong pa nyid ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni/ 
279b2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / chen po stong pa nyid ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ don dam pa
279b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong / mtha' las 'das pa stong
279b4('bum): pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni/ dor ba
279b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong / chos thams cad ste/ nga ba nyid ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi
279b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa
279b7('bum): steng pa nyid kyis stong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa
279b8('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams na/ rdzu 'phru
280a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong / dbang po rnams ni/ dbang po rnams kyis stong / stobs rnams ni/ stobs rnams kyis stong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ byang chub
280a2('bum): yan lag rnams kyis steng / lam ni/ lam gyis stong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong / bsam gtan rnams ni/ bsapa gtad rnams kyis stong / 
280a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni/ tshad med pa rnams kyis stong / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyis steng / rnam par thar pa rnam
280a4('bum): ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis steng / rnam par
280a5('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / swA/ na pa med pa ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pas steng / mngon par
280a6('bum): shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong / ting 'dzin rnams ni/ ting 'dzin rnams kyis steng / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong / de bzhi/ 
280a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong / so so yang dag par rig pa
280a8('bum): rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong / snying rje chen po ni/ snying rje chen pos stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa
280b1('bum): rnams kyis stong // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong / lar cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / phyir mi 'o
280b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong / dgra bcom pa nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong / rang byang chub ni/ rang byang chub kyis stong / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
280b3('bum): ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis steng / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
280b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
280b5('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po gzugs bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam
280b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slob pa lags sam/ 
280b7('bum): gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
280b8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ tsher ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
281a1('bum): pa'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
281a2('bum): ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad sleb

281a4('bum): 'du shes 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams
281a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// 'du byed pa sa bapar bgyi ba'i slad du sleng na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chag

281a7('bum): slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i sladu slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rnam par shes pabs par bgyi ba'i slad du smra
281a8('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par she ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags
281b1('bum): sas rnam par shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
281b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// mig bas par bgyi ba'i sla du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad
281b3('bum): sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mig 'gag par bgyi ba'i sla du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb lags sam/ mig mi skye bar bgyi
281b4('bum): sdang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// rna ba bas par bgyi ba'i slad slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slob pa lags sam/ na

281b8('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna mi skye bar bgyi ba'i sladadu slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// lce bas par bgyi ba'i spang
282a1('bum): srab na/ rnam pa thams sa mkhyen pa cad du srab pa lags sas/ lce 'dang chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i spadu slab na/ rnam pa thams padas khyen pa
282a2('bum): nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ lce 'gag par bgyi ba'i slangadu slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ci du sleb pa lags sam/ lce mi skye bar bgyi ba'i sladu sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
282a3('bum): pa nyid sleb pa lags sam// lus bas par bgyi ba'i slang slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dal ba'i sngadu sleb na/ rnam
282a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ lus mi skye bar bgyi

285a1('bum): sleb pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus

286a1('bum): cher ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher rab mi skye bar bgyi ba'i spang sleb na/

286a8('bum): bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams bas par 'gyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa la
286b1('bum): sam/ sa'i khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sa'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thos

286b6('bum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ me'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
286b7('bum): slob pa lags sam/ me'i khams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rlung gi khams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam
286b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rlung
287a1('bum): khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sreb na/ rnam pa
287a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// nam mkha'i khams pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ na mkha'i khams 'dod
287a3('bum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
287a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ na mkha'i khams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
287a5('bum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i kha mas 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ 
287a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
287a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// ma rig pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
287a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ ma rig pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ma rig pa 'gag par bgyi
287b1('bum): ba'i slad du sde ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ ba rig pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// 'du
287b2('bum): byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sas/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i spang du srab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
287b3('bum): du sleb pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams
287b4('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa 'dod
287b5('bum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa tham sa cad mabyed pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ rnam pa ra shes pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa
287b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// ming dang gzugs pas
287b7('bum): par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer

292b1('bum): stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam// rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thas

292b7('bum): mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// dngos po med pa steng pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams

293a1('bum): sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po med
293a2('bum): ba stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du spong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

293a5('bum): pa lags sam// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pas bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
293a6('bum): de nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i
293a7('bum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
293a8('bum): pa lags sam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chags
293b1('bum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
293b2('bum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// yang dag par spong ba bzhi pas par ba
293b3('bum): ba'i slad du sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
293b4('bum): du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi
293b5('bum): skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa
293b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 
293b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob
293b8('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// dbang po lnga bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa lags sam/ dbang po

294a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dbang po lnga mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// stobs lnga bas par
294a3('bum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
294a4('bum): pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga mi skye bar bgyi slad du sleb na/ rnam pa
294a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam

294a8('bum): du slob pa lags sam// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan

299a1('bum): nam/ 'du shes mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// 'du byed zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

299a8('bum): nam/ mig mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin naH// rna ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
299b1('bum): nam/ rna ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams can pa nyid du sle ba yin nam

299b3('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna mi skye
299b4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// lce zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'dod
299b5('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
299b6('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ lce mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lus zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
299b7('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thad
299b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// yid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid
300a1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
