305b6('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ma/ sred pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sred pa mi skye bar bya ba'i
305b7('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// len pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa 'dod chags dang bral
305b8('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ len pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ len pa mi skye
306a1('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// srid pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa
306a2('bum): yin nam/ srid pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ srid pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
306a3('bum): slob pa yin nam/ srid pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// skye ba zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa
306a4('bum): yin nam/ skye ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad
306a5('bum): mkhyen pa cad du slob pa yin nam/ skye ba mi skye bar bya ba 'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// rga shi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
306a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rga shi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rga shi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
306a7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rga shi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad
306a8('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
306b1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
306b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi
306b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
306b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bzod
306b5('bum): pA pa rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
306b6('bum): sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
306b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
306b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sdeb pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
307a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar
307a2('bum): bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa
307a3('bum): yin nas khasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag
307a4('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ bsam gtan gyi phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
307a5('bum): sleb pa yin nam// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chag
307a6('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
307a7('bum): du slob pa yin nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// nang steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ 
307a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ nang steng pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yid nam/ nang steng pa
307b1('bum): nyid 'gag par bya pa'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
307b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byi stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
307b3('bum): du sleb pa yin nam/ phyi steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
307b4('bum): pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// phyi nang sreng pa nyid zad par bya ba 'phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba
307b5('bum): bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa
307b6('bum): yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// stong pa nyid steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams
307b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid steng pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ steng pa nyid steng pa
307b8('bum): nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ steng pa nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sre
308a1('bum): pa yin nam// chen po stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po stong pa nyid 'dod rags dang bral bar bya/ 
308a2('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sdeb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ chen po
308a3('bum): stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// don dam pa steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
308a4('bum): yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ den dab pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba/ 
308a5('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yi na nam/ don dam pa steng pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
308a6('bum): nam// 'dus byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
308a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus byas stong pa
308a8('bum): nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
308b1('bum): sleb pa nyid nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'gag pa/ 
308b2('bum): bya ba'i phyir sbeng na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mtha'
308b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyi sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
308b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong la nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mtha
308b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// theg pa dang tha ba med pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
308b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ 
308b7('bum): theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
308b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// dor ba med pa steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ der ba med pa stong pa nyi
309a1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin dam/ der ba med pa steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ ra
309a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// rang bzhin stong pa nyid zad par
309a3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa
309a4('bum): yin nam/ rang bzhin steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams
309a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// chos thams cad stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ches thams cad
309a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ches thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam
309a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ches thams cad stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// rang gi mtshan nyid
309a8('bum): stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa
309b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa
309b2('bum): nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
309b3('bum): pa yin nam// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'gog par bya
309b4('bum): ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ sleb pa yin nam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi skye ba ra bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
309b5('bum): du sleb pa yin nas/ dngos po med pa steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgo ba pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags
309b6('bum): dang bral bar ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sre
309b7('bum): pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam
309b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ ngo bo nyid steng pa
310a1('bum): nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
310a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i pir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
310a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slo ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleng
310a4('bum): / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na ma/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bod rgyas skye bar bya ba'i phyir sgo ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin
310a5('bum): nam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyi ra slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dod chag
310a6('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
310a7('bum): ba nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// yang dag par spong ba bzhi zad
310a8('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
310b1('bum): pa nyid du sleb pa yid dam/ yang dag par spong ba bani 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i
310b2('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rdzu
310b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa
310b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rdzu 'bru la gyi rkang pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// dbang po lnga
310b5('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
310b6('bum): pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dbang po lnga mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
310b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral ba
310b8('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stebs
311a1('bum): lnga mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thang
311a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sdeb pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag
311a3('bum): bdun 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
311a4('bum): slob pa yin nam// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
311a5('bum): pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 2pags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bya ba'i
311a6('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
311a7('bum): sleb pa yin nam// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dod chags dang
311a8('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
311b1('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// bsam gtan bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ 
311b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam
311b3('bum): gtan bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ bsam gtan bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
311b4('bum): sleb pa yin nam// tshad med pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar
311b5('bum): bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba 'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
311b6('bum): pa yin nam/ tshad med pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir
311b7('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
311b8('bum): pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
312a1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
312a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
312a3('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sre ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
312a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
312a5('bum): dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya
312a6('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
312a7('bum): slob pa yin nam// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par
312a8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par thar
312b1('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
312b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas// mngon par shes pa rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
312b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nang/ mngon par
312b4('bum): shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mngon pa ra shes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam
312b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zad par bya ba'i phyi na/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ ting
312b6('bum): 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting 'dzin rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
312b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nas/ tingange 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sled pa yin nam// gzungs kyi sgo rnams tha
312b8('bum): par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
313a1('bum): du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
313a2('bum): skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
313a3('bum): slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yid dam/ de bzhin gshegs
313a4('bum): pa'i stebs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs bcu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob
313a5('bum): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// mi 'jigs pa pa'i zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ mi
313a6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa
313a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// so so yang dag par rig pa
313a8('bum): bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams
313b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// so so yang dag par rig
313b2('bum): pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// snying rje chen po zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong
313b3('bum): pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na
313b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ s+ho nga rje chen po mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// sangs rgyas kyi
313b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod
313b6('bum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam
313b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ 
313b8('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i bya
314a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rkun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
314a2('bum): du sleb pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba
314a3('bum): phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
314a4('bum): slob pa yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu' gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
314a5('bum): 'bras bu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// phyir mi 'ong ba 'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir sdeb na/ rnam pa thams
314a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong na
314a7('bum): 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen la nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
314a8('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// dgra bcom pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya/ 
314b1('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
314b2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rang byang chub zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
314b3('bum): nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
314b4('bum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rang byang chub mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ 
314b5('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yi na nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dod chags
314b6('bum): dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
314b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir sleb na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
314b8('bum): nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam
315a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
315a2('bum): pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/ zhes smras pa de ni ma yin no// 
315a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dang rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang
315a4('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa ra 'gyur ram/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de za da pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par
315a5('bum): 'gyur ram/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyu ra ram/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
315a6('bum): 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// rnam pa shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mig gi de
315a7('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa
315a8('bum): 'gyur ram/ sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ 
315b1('bum): ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ 
315b2('bum): spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang
315b3('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ re'i de bzhin nyid

315b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba
315b6('bum): 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang / 
315b7('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus
315b8('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba
316a1('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i 'dus
316a2('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
316a3('bum): 'gyur ram/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba
316a4('bum): 'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te re ga pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
316a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
316a6('bum): pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 
316a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang
316a8('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'ang skye ba 'am 'gag par
316b1('bum): 'gyur ram// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'ab spang ba'am skye

316b3('bum): 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur rab/ na mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i kham
316b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ma rig pa'i de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am
316b5('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'a gyur ram/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
316b6('bum): zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye mched
316b7('bum): drug kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par

317a1('bum): 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
317a2('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid
317a3('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ro/ 
317a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba de zad pa 'am spang ba'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin

317a7('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag
317a8('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa
317b1('bum): 'am spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stong pa nyid steng pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de

317b3('bum): par 'gyur ram/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

317b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am snga

317b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'i
318a1('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ ngo bo nyid

318a3('bum): skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i
318a4('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba zhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'am
318a5('bum): skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dbang po lnga'i de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ stobs lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang
318a6('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
318a7('bum): 'gyur ram/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i de
318a8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ bsam gtan bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par
318b1('bum): 'gyur ram/ tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang
318b2('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ 
318b3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
318b4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur/ ram/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
318b5('bum): yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ tinge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi na ba de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag par
318b6('bum): 'gyur ram/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye bo 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid
318b7('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ra/ 
318b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba
319a1('bum): / 'gag par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhi
319a2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur
319a3('bum): ram/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
319a4('bum): zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang
319a5('bum): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba'i ma skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am
319a6('bum): spang ba 'am skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ram// gsel ba/ 
319a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
319a8('bum): chen po ni/ de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am spang ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag par 'gyur ba med de// rab 'byor de ltar slob
319b1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin nyid la sleb pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
319b2('bum): chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byer de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin// rab
319b3('bum): 'byer de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
319b4('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan gyi
319b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab
319b6('bum): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na
319b7('bum): phyir stong pa nyi slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
319b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chen po steng pa nyid la
320a1('bum): slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ den dam pa stong pa nyid la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob hUM/ 
320a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus byas steng pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus ma byas
320a3('bum): stestong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob
320a4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tho ga ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ra ba 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
320a5('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa
320a6('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
320a7('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sleb
320a8('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dngos po med pa steng pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa
320b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid la slob pa
320b2('bum): yin rab 'byer de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
320b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa
320b4('bum): yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'bor de ltar slob pa'i bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// 
320b5('bum): stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de
320b6('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
320b7('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab
320b8('bum): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshad med pa bzhi la sleb pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// 
321a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// rnam par thar pa brgyad la sngab
321a2('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
321a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
321a4('bum): po ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'a byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la sleb pa yin/ rab
321a5('bum): 'byer de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pa ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/ rab 'byer de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
321a6('bum): be ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
321a7('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 
321a8('bum): byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dang
321b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
321b2('bum): 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
321b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dgra bcom pa
321b4('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rang byang chub la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
321b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams
321b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/ rab
321b7('bum): 'byor de ltar slong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham par mi nus pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sem
321b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bdag gi pha ni de ba
322a1('bum): gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'gon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams
322a2('bum): la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
322a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba'i
322a4('bum): phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sem sa can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ rang
322a5('bum): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da ba' chen po ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du skor ba'i chos kyi 'khor l-i skor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/ 
322a6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhes slob pa yin// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
322a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mo 'chad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'chi
322a8('bum): ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes sleb pa yin te/ 
322b1('bum): rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par mi nuso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ sems can thams cad
322b2('bum): 'khor ba las 'don par 'dod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can dmyal par mi skye'i byol seng gyi skye gnas su mi skye
322b3('bum): ga shin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// yul mtha' 'khob du mi skye'o// yul gtsang rong can du mi skye'o// phyag dar ba dang gdol pa'i rigasu mi skye'o// zhar bar mi 'gyur ro// skar
322b4('bum): ber mi 'gyur ro// zha bar mi 'gyuraro// yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro// 'on par mi 'gyu ro// lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/ 
322b5('bum): dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyu ro// srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa ra mi 'gyuraro// 'dod pas log par g.yem par mi 'gyur
322b6('bum): rdzun du smra bar mi 'gyu ro// phra ma can du mi 'gyur ro// zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig khyal ba can du mi 'gyur ro// chags sems can du mi 'gyur ro// gnod sems can du
322b7('bum): 'gyuraro// log pa la lta bar mi 'gyur ro// 'tshe ba log par 'tshe bar mi 'gyu ro// yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyu ro// tshul
322b8('bum): khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lha tshe rings pa'i nang du mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs
323a1('bum): // mkhas pa dang ldan pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bdu yod de/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ 
323a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/ thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan rnams la'ang snyems par
323a3('bum): 'jug/ tshad med pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyems par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i
323a4('bum): snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po ni/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang / rang sangs
323a5('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yengasu dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das ches tha
323a6('bum): rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
323a7('bum): ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yengasu dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su
323a8('bum): dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing 'gong ba med pa de ni/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323b1('bum): phyin pa ste/ byis pa se so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni/ chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas/ sems can de dag gi don tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
323b2('bum): spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha
323b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod// nang steng pa nyid la sbed/ phyi steng pa nyid la sbed/ byi nang steng pa nyid la spyod/ steng pa nyid steng pa nyid la sbed/ chen po steng pa nyid la spyod/ don dam pa steng pa nyid
323b4('bum): la spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/ 'dus ma/ byas steng pa nyid la spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la skyed/ theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ 
323b5('bum): der ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ rang bzhin steng pa nyid la spyod/ chos thams cad steng pa nyid la spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbed/ mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid
323b6('bum): la sbed/ dngos po med pa steng pa nyid la spyod// ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid la spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod/ yang dag par
323b7('bum): sbeng ba bzhi la spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/ dbang po lnga la spyod/ stobs lnga la spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa la
323b8('bum): sbed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi la sbed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/ 
324a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu la spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa la spyod/ mngon par shes
324a2('bum): pa rnams la spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/ so so yang dag par rig
324a3('bum): pa bzhi la spyod/ byams pa chen po la spyod/ snying rje chen po la spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod/ lan cig phyir
324a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spro da/ dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod/ rang byang chub la spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/ rnam pa thams
324a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo ni/ chos tha mas cad kyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu 'thob
324a6('bum): par 'gyur te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang
324a7('bum): spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbram 'byung ba de lta
324a8('bum): bu ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ngo // sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
324b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba las yang dag
324b2('bum): par blangs ste/ gnas pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/ sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par spangs shing gnas pa'i de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab 'byor de
324b3('bum): bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/ sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par
324b4('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo // rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
324b5('bum): dag par zhugs pa de dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan bye da ba de lta bu ches nyung ngo // de bas kyang sems can gang
324b6('bum): nyan thos sam// rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
324b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la spyod cing the tsom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni gang phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo // 
324b8('bum): rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldeg pa'i sa theb par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
325a1('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
325a2('bum): ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// g.yeng
325a3('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// shes rab 'chal pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gti mug
325a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tha ba dang ldan pa'i sem sa mi skye'o// gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du shes dang ldan
325a5('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye 'o// mig dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba dang ldan
325a6('bum): ba'i sems mi skye'o// sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lce dang ldan pa'i sems kyi skye'o// lus dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// gzugs dang
325a7('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sgra dang ldam pa'i sems mi skye'o// dri dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ro dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// reg dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chos dang lnga
325a8('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o// mig rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems
325b1('bum): mi skye'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mig
325b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
325b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
325b4('bum): gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rna ba'i 'a dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i se mas mi skye'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab
325b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sem
325b6('bum): mi skye'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chu'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// me'i
325b7('bum): khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rlung gi khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
325b8('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mo skye'o// ming dang
326a1('bum): gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// skye mched drug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tsher ba dang ldan pa'i se
326a2('bum): mi skye'o// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// len pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// srid pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// skye ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rga
326a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// bzod pa'i pa
326a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// brtson 'gru sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye
326a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// / nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyi stong pa nyi de dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang
326a6('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// de na dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 
326a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// theg
326a8('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ldan dang pI sems mi skye'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chos thams cad ste/ 
326b1('bum): panyid dang ldan pa'i sems sa skye'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mi dmigs pa stong panyid dang ldan pa'i sems sa skye'o// dngas pa med pa stong panyid dang lda
326b2('bum): ba'i sems mi skye'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang ldan pa'i sems
326b3('bum): mi skye'o// yang dag par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// stobs dang ldan pa'i sems
326b4('bum): mi skye'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i sem
326b5('bum): mi skye'o// bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// chad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzugs me dpa'i snyems par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// / 
326b6('bum): rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
326b7('bum): dang / smon pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems
326b8('bum): mi skye'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// / 
327a1('bum): byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rgyun tu
327a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// dgra ba
327a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rang byang chub dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// lam gyi rnam shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
327a4('bum): sems mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
327a5('bum): gang yang dmigs pa med de ma dmigs pas/ chos ga nga la yang sems bskyed pa med do// rab 'byer de ltar she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang
327a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu zin par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams
327a7('bum): dang 'thun par spyod par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byer 'di lta
327a8('bum): dper na/ 'jig tshogasu lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa
327b1('bum): thams cad 'dus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tshe ba'i dbang po 'gags pas/ dbang po thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang
327b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spyod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin te/ rab 'byor de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'
327b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
327b4('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di la bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mcho ga tu gyur pa la sleb pa yin no// rab 'byor de ji snyam
327b5('bum): du sems/ steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
327b6('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/ steng gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
327b7('bum): sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa
327b8('bum): dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
328a1('bum): thams cad re re la yang sku tshe'i mthar phyin gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rgyun ma chad pa na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang
328a2('bum): gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams/ de'i
328a3('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ngas kyang / rigs kyi
328a4('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shwe rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de
328a5('bum): bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes
328a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar don chen por 'gyur ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o// rab 'byor de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
328a7('bum): chen po sems can thams cad bla na med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa thams cad kyi 'gen du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / skyabs med pa rnams kyi
328a8('bum): skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / long ba rnams kyi mig du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / mun par gnas pa rnams kyi/ 
328b1('bum): sgron mar 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par brtse bar
328b2('bum): 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsgrag par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dung bud par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gtam bya ba/ 
328b3('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
328b4('bum): ni phun sum tshogs pa gang theb par bya ba de dag las mi 'thob pa gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs
328b5('bum): pa yang des 'thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
328b6('bum): 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang des thob par bya ste/ de la gnas par mi bya/ 'dug par mi bya'i/ shes pa
328b7('bum): dang mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/ 'da' bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa
328b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
329a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa
329a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ba
329a3('bum): yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar sleb pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gto
329a4('bum): zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o// rab 'a byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la
329a5('bum): spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen be ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongasu minyam pa'i chos can du rig par bya ste/ nyan thos dang
329a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ring du byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin// gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / 
329a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/ gal te de ltar shes na shes
329a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// gal te 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di la yod do// shes par bya bar shes pa
329b1('bum): med de/ gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'byung ste/ bla na med
329b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu mi shes mi mthong zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / yang
329b3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
329b4('bum): 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang med do/ zhes// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha
329b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bzhi bcu brgyad do// de
329b6('bum): nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
329b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod/ 
329b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas steng
330a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thang
330a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid la'ang spyod/ 
330a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa
330a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la'ang spyod// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang
330a5('bum): spyod// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med/ 
330a6('bum): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la yang spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
330a7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang spyod bzhin du/ sems can thams cad zil gyis non na/ bla
330a8('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na lta ci smos// sems can gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag
330b1('bum): kyang thob pa legs par theb cing / de dag gi 'che ba legs par 'tshe ba yin na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lta ci smos/ sems can gang gis
330b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ 
330b3('bum): me tog mnad rab mang po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song nas/ me tog man da ra ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
330b4('bum): sangs rgyas la gter te// mngon par gtor to// de lta ra gter te/ mngon par gtor ba dang rab tu gter ba byas nas/ tshig 'di skad ces brjed de// dge ba'i rtsa
330b5('bum): ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmig sa pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi ches yongasu rdzogs
330b6('bum): par gyur cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang byung gi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su
330b7('bum): rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa slar ldeg pa
330b8('bum): 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur
331a1('bum): par sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa skyed cing yang dang yang du bla na med pa yang dag par
331a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don du byas pa smin par mes/ 
331a3('bum): bde bar mes shing legs par bgyi bar mes te/ sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar rtog ste/ ci'i bdag rgal nas
331a4('bum): sems can ma rgal ba sgrol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag grel nas sems can ma grel pa 'grol bar 'gyur ram/ ci bdag dbugs phyin nas sems can dbugs ma byung ba
331a5('bum): 'byin par 'gyur ram/ ci bdag yengs mya ngan las 'ang sa nas/ sems can yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa/ yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ram zhes rtog par
331a6('bum): bgyid te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjesu yi rang bar bgyid
331a7('bum): ba dang yun ring po nas spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la/ rje su yi rang bar bgyid pa dang / phyir mi ldeg pa'i byang chub
331a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi n+da bA bgyid pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
331b1('bum): kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rje su yi rang bar bgyid na/ rigs kyi bu 'ab rigs kyi bu me de'i bsod napas ji tsam/ zhig du 'phel bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
331b2('bum): kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse me'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi
331b3('bum): rje su yi ring ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la tshad med do// ke'u shi ka steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang sred kyi de dag
331b4('bum): gi rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// ko'u shaM ka steng gnyis kyi 'ji garten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse me'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar
331b5('bum): yang srid kyi de dag gi rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni
331b6('bum): skra'i rtse me'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar yang srid kyi de dag gi rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen
331b7('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ba rgya mtsho chen po rnams la chu'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de ni skra'i rtse me brgyar gshegs pa'i cha gcig gis chu'i thigs pa blang ba'i tshad kyis
331b8('bum): tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/ de dag gi rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med de// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin
332a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rje su yi rang bar mi 'gyid pa'i sems can de dag re bdud
332a2('bum): don gyis brlabs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang
332a3('bum): sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa'o// ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems
332a4('bum): bskyed pa 'di bsgrubs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu yengasu sngo ba'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa ste/ gang bla
332a5('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskyed pa'i sems de dag ni rje su yi rang bar bgyi ba ste/ gang gis sangs rgyas yongasu ma btang ba dang / chos yeng
332a6('bum): su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongasu ma btang ba de dag gis/ sems bskyed pa de dag gis rje su yi rang bar bgyi'o// rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
332a7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar gnyis kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba dang / gnyis su ma mchis pa'i 'du shes su 'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongasasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bcom
332a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka gang sems bskyed pa de dag la rje su yi rang bar byed pa de
332b1('bum): dag ni myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 
332b2('bum): de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa dag ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag du rim 'gror bya bar 'gyur ro// bkur bstir bya bar
332b3('bum): 'gyu ro// phu dud du bya bar 'gyur ro// mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro// des nam yang gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// nam yang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba thos par mi 'gyu ro// nam
